short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily send selected text to ChatGPT for instant assistance.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
About extension:
AiPrompt is a simple-to-use product that will enrich your browsing experience with a couple of features. The extension will update your new tab settings and will change your search to be powered by Microsoft Bing.
Enjoy personalized new tab experience with added productivity features. Customize your new tab with a random background, clock, search box, and personalized greeting using your saved name. 

AiPromptText browser extension allows you to browse the Web and, in additon offers the option to use ChatGPT. 

After text selection in your browser you can hit the right click and in the context menu our icon will appear allowing you to easily prompt ChatGPT for the text that you selected.

Clicking our icon, will open a popup with an input, allowing you to easily send any message to ChatGPT.

Useful Information:
By clicking "Add to chrome", I accept and agree to installing 'AiPrompt', change New Tab to that provided by the service, New Tab searches to be powered by Microsoft Bing, the Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
Just start by typing preferred search term (query) into the search box. The AiPrompt search will provide Bing SERP with proper results.
Clicking on the icon, will prompt the ChatGPT.
To remove the AiPrompt extension simply go to Google Chrome "Settings" page. Find the "Extensions" in the settings menu and there you will find AiPrompt extension listed.
To uninstall it just use the "Remove" button.
Permissions Requested: "Replace the page you see when opening a new tab"
About us:
AiPrompt team is dedicated to creating genuine products which will be useful for our users. We tend to provide GDPR aligned products, always prioritizing users' privacy. 
Considering that, we recognize that location-sharing is a concern for many people (ourselves included) and it is a responsibility we take very seriously. For more information on privacy and the security of your data visit our Privacy policy below.

To reach our support please write us to this email: contact@aipromptext.com

For additional information please check links below:
